movies.title: The King's Speech
movies.plot: The King's Speech tells the story of the man who became King George VI, the father of Queen Elizabeth II. After his brother abdicates, George ('Bertie') reluctantly assumes the throne. Plagued by a dreaded stutter and considered unfit to be king, Bertie engages the help of an unorthodox speech therapist named Lionel Logue. Through a set of unexpected techniques, and as a result of an unlikely friendship, Bertie is able to find his voice and boldly lead the country into war.

movies.title: All Good Things
movies.plot: Newly-discovered facts, court records and speculation are used to elaborate the true love story and murder mystery of the most notorious unsolved murder case in New York history.

Susan Berman, who Deborah Lehrman is based on, is killed

movies.title: The Great Debaters
movies.plot: The true story of a brilliant but politically radical debate team coach who uses the power of words to transform a group of underdog African-American college students into a historical powerhouse that took on the Harvard elite.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 11 wins & 9 nominations.

events.title: the Wiley Debate team beat the reigning champions

movies.title: The Founder
movies.plot: The true story of how Ray Kroc, a salesman from Illinois, met Mac and Dick McDonald, who were running a burger operation in 1950s Southern California. Kroc was impressed by the brothers’ speedy system of making the food and saw franchise potential. He maneuvered himself into a position to be able to pull the company from the brothers and create a billion-dollar empire.

events.title: Ray Kroc opens his first McDonald's franchise restaurant

movies.title: Control
movies.plot: Control is the biography of Joy Division lead singer Ian Curtis, taking his story from schoolboy days of 1973 to his suicide on the eve of the band's first American tour in 1980.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 31 wins & 34 nominations.

events.title: Ian Curtis marries Deborah Woodruff
Ian Curtis and Debbie Woodruff attend a Sex Pistols concert in Manchester
the band Warsaw, soon to be renamed to Joy Division, forms
Ian Curtis and Debbie Woodruff fight for the last time
Ian Curtis commits suicide at 23 years old

movies.title: Fanboys
movies.plot: In 1999, Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of The Phantom Menace before its release.

events.title: a group of high school friends reunite at a Halloween party and talk about stealing a copy of The Phantom Menace
Eric finds out that his friend Linus has cancer
the friends set out on a journey to Skywalker Ranch
the friends break into Skywalker Ranch and get to watch The Phantom Menace
the friends, apart from Linus, watch The Phantom Menace on its opening day

movies.title: Lion
movies.plot: A five-year-old Indian boy gets lost on the streets of Calcutta, thousands of kilometers from home. He survives many challenges before being adopted by a couple in Australia; 25 years later, he sets out to find his lost family.
movies.awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 59 wins & 98 nominations.

events.title: Saroo's "birthday", the day he was taken in by Indian authorities before being given to an adoptive family

movies.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
movies.plot: With the Third Reich is at his peak in 1942, the Czech resistance in London plans the most ambitious military operation of WWII –  Anthropoid. Two young recruits are sent to Prague to assassinate the most ruthless Nazi leader – Reinhardt Heydrich – head of the SS, the Gestapo and the architect of the Final Solution.

events.title: an ultimately successful attempt is made on Reinhard Heydrich's life

movies.title: Bobby
movies.plot: In 1968 the lives of a retired doorman, hotel manager, lounge singer, busboy, beautician and others intersect in the wake of Robert F. Kennedy's assassination at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.title: One Chance
movies.plot: This film follows the remarkable and inspirational true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.

events.title: Mark stabs his friend John

movies.title: My Week with Marilyn
movies.plot: Sir Laurence Olivier is making a movie in London. Young Colin Clark, an eager film student, wants to be involved and he navigates himself a job on the set. When film star Marilyn Monroe arrives for the start of shooting, all of London is excited to see the blonde bombshell, while Olivier is struggling to meet her many demands and acting ineptness, and Colin is intrigued by her. Colin's intrigue is met when Marilyn invites him into her inner world where she struggles with her fame, her beauty and her desire to be a great actress.
